front.title: An Overview of the Design of BIMI

abstract.t: Brand Indicators for Message Identification (BIMI) provides a mechanism for mail senders to publish a validated logotype that mail receivers can display with the senders' messages. This document provides a brief overview of BIMI and examines some of the trade offs and decisions in its design. Discussion venue Comments on this draft may be directed to the BIMI list at bimi@ietf.org.
